snippet.title: GOODLANDS - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
This is a trailer for GOODLANDS, a 3D pixel art game about dinos digging up dinos. Play as a paleontologist -- prospect for fossils and assemble excavation sites in a small, curated, but rich open world based on the Montana badlands, all the while interacting with a cast of anthropomorphic dinosaur townsfolk.

If you're interested wishlist on steam and/or follow me on twitter!

WISHLIST: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1797850/Goodlands/
TWITTER:  https://twitter.com/thegeolojosh  

The amazing music was composed by @CrystalWaveMachine
